questions.question_text: A junior network technician at a large company needs to create networks from a Class C address with 14 hosts per subnet. Which of the following numbers of host bits is required?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
The principle of least privilege dictates that users or systems should only have access to the resources necessary for their job functions no more, no less. If the accountant can only see the financial department‚Äôs shared folders, this directly reflects least privilege.

questions.question_text: Which of the following is a company most likely enacting if an accountant for the company can only see the financial department's shared folders?
Which of the following connector types would most likely be used to connect to an external antenna?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
BNC connectors are commonly used in radio frequency (RF) applications, particularly for external antennas due to their durability and weatherproofing capabilities, especially in VHF/UHF systems

questions.question_text: A company recently converted most of the office laptops to connect wirelessly to the corporate network. After a recent high-traffic malware attack, narrowing the event to a specific user was difficult because of the wireless configuration. Which of the following actions should the company take?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
Enterprise authentication (WPA2-Enterprise or WPA3-Enterprise) uses 802.1X with a RADIUS server, requiring unique credentials per user, allowing administrators to Identify specific users in security logs.

Selected Answer: A
IaaS most likely requires the greatest up-front expense due to the complexity of migrating entire server environments, including potential downtime, licensing, and professional services. PaaS could be costly if apps need heavy refactoring, but IaaS typically mirrors a data center‚Äôs scope more directly, amplifying initial costs.

questions.question_text: Which of the following cloud service models most likely requires the greatest up-front expense by the customer when migrating a data center to the cloud?
